exportAllRoleRules.title: Export Rules
exportAllRoleRules.description: Export all role rules from all modes to project .roo folder for customization and version control.
exportAllRoleRules.success: All role rules have been exported to the project .roo folder
exportAllRoleRules.error: Failed to export all role rules
exportAllRoleRules.warning: Failed to load prompts from API. Please check your internet connection.
